formValidations.username-min-characters: Username must be 6 characters or more
formValidations.username-max-characters: Username must be 15 characters or less
formValidations.username-trim: Username name cannot include leading and trailing spaces
formValidations.password-min-characters: Password is too short - should be 8 chars minimum
formValidations.password-max-characters: Password must be 20 characters or less
formValidations.password-trim: Password cannot include leading and trailing spaces
formValidations.password-must-match-latin-letters: Password can only contain Latin letters
formValidations.firstName-min-characters: First name must be 1 characters or more
formValidations.firstName-max-characters: First name must be 20 characters or less
formValidations.firstName-trim: First name cannot include leading and trailing spaces
formValidations.lastName-min-characters: Last name must be 1 characters or more
formValidations.lastName-max-characters: Last name must be 20 characters or less
formValidations.lastName-trim: Last name cannot include leading and trailing spaces
